document.forum_title: San Francisco Chronicle - Bay Area news, sports, tech, food - San Francisco Chronicle
document.discussion_title: Lake County, already on the ropes, hit hard by wildfires
document.topic_text: Photo: Gabrielle Lurie, Special To The Chronicle Robert Allen Kraft, 91, a retired physician, watches television in the trailer home he has been living in since his house was destroyed last year in the Valley Fire, in Middletown, California, on Thursday, Aug. 18, 2016. Robert Allen Kraft, 91, a retired physician, watches television in... LOWER LAKE, Lake County — In this little town, Irene Black is as close to a fixture as a person can be. But after spending half of her 82 years here, her home is a Red Cross shelter.

Robert Allen Kraft, 91, a retired physician, watches television in... LOWER LAKE, Lake County — In this little town, Irene Black is as close to a fixture as a person can be. But after spending half of her 82 years here, her home is a Red Cross shelter.
